messages.subject: conference registration deadline
messages.msgSnippet: I just want to remind everyone that the conference s Early Bird Deadline is THIS Sunday, July 31. Postmarked by that date is fine---don t bust a gut to try to
messages.messageBody:
I just want to remind everyone that the conference's Early Bird
Deadline is THIS Sunday, July 31.

Postmarked by that date is fine---don't bust a gut to try to get it
here *before* then.

Funshop presenters also need to fill out registrations! Just because
you're working doesn't mean you don't wear a nametag! Please get
registrations to me.

If you have decided not to come and have an already reserved hotel room
you will not be using, please announce it on the
LiveandLearnConference@yahoogroups.com e-list. I know someone will be
willing to take it!

And isn't it cool about the RV parking at the hotel? <g>

Thanks so much!

~Kelly


Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org
